Class VariableStatement

java.lang.Object
Statement
VariableStatement
public class VariableStatement extends Statement
A source of income or an expense with a variable (non-fixed) amount

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • VariableStatement

      public VariableStatement(boolean type, String name, String desc, double period, double low, double high)
      Creates a new VariableStatement object with a description
      Parameters:
      type - - true if income, false if expense
      name - - name for the statement
      desc - - description for the statement
      period - - period in days
      low - - estimate of the lowest dollar amount paid per period
      high - - estimate of the highest dollar amount paid per period

    • VariableStatement

      public VariableStatement(boolean type, String name, double period, double low, double high)
      Creates a new VariableStatement object without a description
      Parameters:
      type - - true if income, false if expense
      name - - name for the statement
      period - - period in days
      low - - estimate of the lowest dollar amount paid per period
      high - - estimate of the highest dollar amount paid per period

      Creates a new VariableStatement object by copying another

      other - - the object to be copied
